      • recordsSummary

        public java.lang.String recordsSummary(int selectedSummary,
                              int SummaryUseMLE,
                              java.lang.String method)
        Generates a textual summary of the database contents
        Parameters:
        selectedSummary - Chooses between single modality or difference summary
        SummaryUseMLE - Use biased components for summary
        method - Which decomposition is being used
        Returns:
        String with description of contents of the database

      • readRecord

              int recordNum)
        Reads a single DB file from the database folder
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename of database file
        isr - Stream reader containing DB file
        recordNum - Identifying number for where to place record in internal list of records
